Maven Play2 Plugin

The play2-maven-plugin is used to build Play 2 applications using Maven. Basically, it just a wrapper around the play command. It supports the application compilation, test and packaging.

Goals Overview

The Play2 Plugin has only several goals included in the play2 packaging:

  • play2-maven-plugin:copy-dependencies copies the dependencies to the lib folder.
  • play2-maven-plugin:compile compiles your application.
  • play2-maven-plugin:test tests your application.
  • play2-maven-plugin:package packages your application.
  • play2-maven-plugin:clean cleans the project.

    There is also goals not bound to the Maven lifecycle:

  • play2-maven-plugin:run runs the application (ctrl-c to exit).

Usage

General instructions on how to use the play2-maven-plugin can be found on the usage page.
